full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 645 Filed 03/11/22 Page 13 of 50
M38TMAX1
1 no because you didn't consider them family.
2 A. Family, yeah.
3 Q. But now you say yes because it would have been a stepbrother. Explain.
4 A. Because by law, by marriage, that person was my stepbrother. So when you read the question that way and it
5 says has a friend or family member ever been accused, then the correct answer would have been yes, a friend or family member.
6 Q. Okay. And so the same response then for 48A is what you would have given for 49B?
7 A. Yes, your Honor.
8 Q. And 49B, if your answer to 49 was yes, do you believe this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a
9 juror in this case?
10 A. In no case. It would not affect me.
11 Q. In responding a moment ago you said you never thought you would be chosen as a juror in this case. Why is that?
12 A. Only because the sheer volume of people that were there. It was insane, the amount of people. So I just never
13 thought -- number one, I didn't know what it was when I went into it, and then when they played the video of you, I just
14 thought that the likelihood of being chosen, surely they will be interviewing thousands of people. And they ultimately
15 choose twelve people to sit on a jury, and I never thought I would be one of those twelve.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00010228

1 no because you didn't consider them family.
2 A. Family, yeah.
3 Q. But now you say yes because it would have been a stepbrother. Explain.
4 A. Because by law, by marriage, that person was my stepbrother. So when you read the question that way and it
5 says has a friend or family member ever been accused, then the correct answer would have been yes, a friend or family member.
6 Q. Okay. And so the same response then for 48A is what you would have given for 49B?
7 A. Yes, your Honor.
8 Q. And 49B, if your answer to 49 was yes, do you believe this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a
9 juror in this case?
10 A. In no case. It would not affect me.
11 Q. In responding a moment ago you said you never thought you would be chosen as a juror in this case. Why is that?
12 A. Only because the sheer volume of people that were there. It was insane, the amount of people. So I just never
13 thought -- number one, I didn't know what it was when I went into it, and then when they played the video of you, I just
14 thought that the likelihood of being chosen, surely they will be interviewing thousands of people. And they ultimately
15 choose twelve people to sit on a jury, and I never thought I would be one of those twelve.
